#include<stdio.h>
#define getcx getchar_unlocked
inline void inp( int &n )//fast input function
{
   n=0;
   int ch=getcx();int sign=1;
   while( ch < '0' || ch > '9' ){if(ch=='-')sign=-1; ch=getcx();}
 
   while(  ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
           n = (n<<3)+(n<<1) + ch-'0', ch=getcx();
   n=n*sign;
}

int main()
{
    int t,n,a,b,p,q,sum1,sum2,i;
    inp(t);
    while(t--)
    {
              sum1=0;
              sum2=0;
              inp(n);
              int arr[n],brr[n];
              inp(a);
              inp(b);
              for(i=0;i<n;i++)
              {
              inp(arr[i]);
              inp(brr[i]);
              p=arr[i]-a;
              if(p<0)
              p=p*-1;
              sum1=sum1+p;
              q=brr[i]-b;
              if(q<0)
              q=q*-1;
              sum2=sum2+q;
              }
              sum1=sum1+sum2;
              printf("%d\n",2*sum1);
    }
    return 0;
}
